name: asta-design-system
description: A minimal design system with monospace grid-based layouts
author: Antonio Roldao

scripts.build:js: terser src/js/asta.js -o src/js/asta.min.js --compress --mangle && terser src/js/examples.js -o src/js/examples.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:dist
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:scss" "npm run watch:css" "npm run serve" --names "SCSS,CSS,Server" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green"
